description:
As a user
  I want to add tasks in app page
  so that tasks are shown once are added
name: Test add tasks

elements.name: Create a single task and validate it was created correctly

steps.name: user click on add task button
user select the due date for today

result.error_message:
AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 4000ms: Expected to find element: `[data-track='scheduler|date_shortcut_today']`, but never found it.

steps.name: user write some name for the task 'Finish the SQA Challenge'
user click on add task button
the added task should be visible
